kpi_info.title: SEC_UNA_DURATION
kpi_info.use: Number of unavailable duration on one diameter connection. If the value is FFFFFFFF,the field is not shown. Measure Object: MSC\UNIT_TYPE\UNIT_INDEX\DEST_NAME HLR\UNIT_TYPE\UNIT_INDEX\DEST_NAME localMoid format include UNIT_TYPE,UNIT_INDEX,DEST_NAME For example: 'DN:UNIT_TYPE-CCSU/UNIT_INDEX-0/DEST_NAME-MILAN'
